hanzi-su-wiki:
了

Значения

Покончить, разделаться с чем-либо

Мнемоника

Ребенок 子 без рук. Он не жизнеспособен и появился на свет только для того, чтобы завершить свою жизнь.

Варианты

暸, 瞭

le

purpleculture_examples:
为了 [ wèi le ]: in order to; for the purpose of; so as to
除了 [ chú le ]: besides; apart from (... also...); in addition to; except (for)
得了 [ dé le ]: all right!; that's enough!
算了 [ suàn le ]: let it be; let it pass; forget about it
罢了 [ bà le ]: a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
了解 [ liǎo jiě ]: to understand; to realize; to find out
了解 [ liǎo jiě ]: to understand; to realize; to find out
了不起 [ liǎo bu qǐ ]: amazing; terrific; extraordinary
受不了 [ shòu bù liǎo ]: unbearable; unable to endure; can't stand
不得了 [ bù dé liǎo ]: desperately serious; disastrous; extremely; exceedingly

heisig_chinese_memo: This is a grammatical particle similar to the English (-ed).  It looks like the character for 'child' except not complet-ed.
heisig_constituent: complete, child with arms wrapped up
heisig_story: Learn this character by returning to frame 99 and the image given there. The only difference is that the "arms" have been left off (actually, only tucked inside). Thus a child with its arms wrapped up into the back-sack is the picture of a job successfully completed.
koohiiStory1: The experiment was a complete failure! The child was made without any arms!
koohiiStory2: A child with the arms inside the blanket will be completely wrapped up.
jp_example_words:
修了(しゅうりょう): completion (of a course)
了(りょう): finish, completion, understanding
了解(りょうかい): comprehension, consent, understanding, roger (on the radio)
了承(りょうしょう): acknowledgement, understanding (e.g. "please be understanding of the mess during our renovation")
完了(かんりょう): completion, conclusion
終了(しゅうりょう): end, close, termination
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Think about it this way. There is a famous fishing lure inventor, working on his best work ever. He’s old, and he’s been trying to make the best fishing lure for the last 50 years, and knows this will be his last invention. Then he figures it out. He takes one barb, and connects the end of it to the top of another barb. When he does this, he knows his work is finally finished.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Make sure you look at this amazing fishing lure too - hold it in your hand, see the two barbs fused together. Think about how strange this lure is. Is this really the best in the world? Will this really finish all other fishing lures?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: How does the fish lure maker test his newly finished lure out? The one he just finished? He gets in a row (りょう) boat and rows out into the sea.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Make him think that he can’t just use his new lure on the side of the lake / ocean / whatever. He has to get out there, but unfortunately all he has is a crappy row boat. Imagine the row boat being terrible, leaky, and dangerous, which is why you’re surprised when he goes for it. That’s a terrible row boat to use! If you do this, you'll focus your mind on the rowboat part of things, which will help you to remember the reading of this kanji.

humanum_full_description_en:
Like a curved shape of hands and legs, it means that hands and legs are bent. "Shuowen": "Ye Ye. Congzi has no arms, pictograms. Everything is followed."

" A " often means over and over. Han Wang praised "Tong Yue": "Wake up in the morning and sweep early, eat and wash."

" The " also said decisions, decisions. "Yin Wenzi‧ on the Dadao": "However, right is not to follow the crowd and to be righteous, not to be alone."

" A " also means smart and wise. "Book of the Later Han-Kong Rong Biography": "Madam is small but clever, but she may not be surprised."

" L " also means understanding and understanding. Jin Guopu's "Preface to "Er Ya": "If it is changed, it will be ignored."

" Liao " also refers to clarity and clarity. Jin Gehong "Baopuzi-Zhili": "He is sincere to what he has seen, so abandoning it is like forgetting his ears."

" L " can also mean bright and bright. Qing Nalan Xingde's "Pipa Fairy-Mid-Autumn Festival": "Blowing a piece of autumn fragrance, it is as clear as snow."

" A " is also used as an adverb, represent extremely, very much. Tang Hanwei (Gong Liu): "Fortunately, when Yu Nian passed by, I was afraid of the mighty golden wind."

" A " is also used as a particle. "A Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 31: "Baoyu poured tea to the case and rinsed the mouth for Xiren."
356 Characters
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: It is like a curved shape of hands and legs, meaning that hands and legs are curved.
humanum_full_description:
象手腿彎曲之形，表示手腿彎曲。《說文》：「尥也。从子無臂，象形。凡了之屬皆从了。」

　　「了」常表示完畢、結束。漢王褒〈僮約〉：「晨起早掃，食了洗滌。」

　　「了」也表示決斷、決定。《尹文子‧大道上》：「然則是非隨眾賈而為正，非己所獨了。」

　　「了」還表示聰敏、穎慧。《後漢書‧孔融傳》：「夫人小而聰了，大未必奇。」

　　「了」亦表示瞭解、明瞭。晉郭璞《〈爾雅〉序》：「其所易了，闕而不論。」

　　「了」還指清楚、明晰。晉葛洪《抱樸子‧至理》：「誠其所見者了，故棄之如忘耳。」

　　「了」也可表示明亮、光亮。清納蘭性德《琵琶仙‧中秋》：「吹到一片秋香，清輝瞭如雪。」

　　「了」還用作副詞，表示極其、非常。唐韓偓〈宮柳〉：「幸當玉輦經過處，了怕金風浩蕩時。」

　　「了」也可用作助詞。《紅樓夢》第31回：「寶玉向案上斟了茶來，給襲人漱口。」
356 Characters

①表示肯定语气。［合］明天又是星期六了；要过新年了，人们都很高兴。
②表示促进或劝止。［合］快躲了；别吵了！闪开了！
③表示感叹语气。［例］好了！别闹了！
④另见liǎo。
①明白，知道：明了。一目了然。
②完结，结束：完了。了结。
③在动词后，与“不”、“得”连用，表示可能或不可能：看不了。办得了。
④与“得”、“不得”前后连用，表示异乎寻常或情况严重：那还了得！
⑤了。
⑥放在动词或形容词后，表示动作或变化已经完成：写完了。
⑦助词，用在句子末尾或句中停顿的地方，表示变化，表示出现新的情况：刮风了。

象手腿彎曲之形，表示手腿彎曲。《說文》：「尥也。从子無臂，象形。凡了之屬皆从了。」 「 了 」常表示完畢、結束。漢王褒〈僮約〉：「晨起早掃，食了洗滌。」 「 了 」也表示決斷、決定。《尹文子‧大道上》：「然則是非隨眾賈而為正，非己所獨了。」 「 了 」還表示聰敏、穎慧。《後漢書‧孔融傳》：「夫人小而聰了，大未必奇。」 「 了 」亦表示瞭解、明瞭。晉郭璞《〈爾雅〉序》：「其所易了，闕而不論。」 「 了 」還指清楚、明晰。晉葛洪《抱樸子‧至理》：「誠其所見者了，故棄之如忘耳。」 「 了 」也可表示明亮、光亮。清納蘭性德《琵琶仙‧中秋》：「吹到一片秋香，清輝瞭如雪。」 「 了 」還用作副詞，表示極其、非常。唐韓偓〈宮柳〉：「幸當玉輦經過處，了怕金風浩蕩時。」 「 了 」也可用作助詞。《紅樓夢》第31回：「寶玉向案上斟了茶來，給襲人漱口。」 356 Characters

了字的基本解释

了
liǎo
明白，知道：明了。一目了然。
完结，结束：完了。了结。
在动词后，与“不”、“得”连用，表示可能或不可能：看不了。办得了。
与“得”、“不得”前后连用，表示异乎寻常或情况严重：那还了得！

了
放在动词或形容词后，表示动作或变化已经完成：写完了。
助词，用在句子末尾或句中停顿的地方，表示变化，表示出现新的情况：刮风了。

了字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liǎo］
［《廣韻》盧鳥切，上篠，來。］
(1)手弯曲。见“了尦”。
(2)决断；决定。
(3)完毕；结束。
(4)聪敏，颖慧。
(5)了解；明瞭。
(6)清楚；明晰。
(7)指明亮，光亮。
(8)胜任。
(9)亏损。
(10)副词。与否定词连用。完全；皆。
(11)副词。极其，非常。
(12)副词。终究；究竟。
(13)放在动词之后跟“得”或“不”连用，表示可能或不可能。
[②]［le˙］
(1)助词。表时态。表示动作或变化的完成（不论事实或虚拟、过去或未来）。
(2)助词。表时态。用在重叠的动词之间，表示短暂之间动作的重复。
(3)助词。表语气。表示肯定或确定某种情况。
(4)助词。表语气。表示祈使。
[③]［liǎo］
“瞭1”的简化字。
[④]［liào］
“瞭2”的简化字。

了字的英文翻译

◎ 了
end, finish, know clearly, oversee, settle, understand

了字的康熙字典解释

【子集上】【亅字部】　了； 康熙笔画：2； 页码：页85第11
【唐韻】盧鳥切【集韻】【韻會】郞鳥切【正韻】盧皎切，?聊上聲。【增韻】決也。【廣韻】慧也，曉解也。【後漢·孔融傳】融年十二聰慧。?煒曰：小而了了，大未必奇。又【宋書·戴法興傳】彭城王覓一了了令史，得法興使爲之。　又訖也，畢也。【晉書·傅毅傳】天下大器，非可稍了，而相觀每事欲了，生子癡了官事，官事未易了也。【杜甫詩】岱宗夫如何。齊魯靑未了。　又【揚子·方言】了，快也。秦曰了。　又秦吉了，鳥名。【仇池筆記注】似鸚鵡，腦有肉冠，能言笑。

了字的源字形

了字的起名意思

：指聪敏、明亮、明晰。

liǎo
Understand, know: understand. It's clear at a glance.
It's over, it's over: it's over. It's over.
After the verb, it is used with "no" and "得" to indicate possible or impossible: I can't see it. It can be done.
Used in conjunction with "de" and "not" to indicate an unusual or serious situation: it's worth it!
Up
Placed after a verb or adjective, it means that the action or change has been completed: it is finished.
Auxiliary words, used at the end of a sentence or where there is a pause in a sentence, indicate a change and a new situation: the wind is blowing.
Up
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liǎo］
["Guangyun" Lu Niaoqie, Shangxiao, come. ]
(1) The hand is bent. See "Liao 尦".
(2) Decision; decision.
(3) Finish; End.
(4) Smart, Yinghui.
(5) Understand; understand.
(6) Clear; clear.
(7) Refers to bright and bright.
(8) Competent.
(9) Loss.
(10) Adverbs. Used with negative words. Completely; all.
(11) Adverbs. Extremely, very much.
(12) Adverbs. After all; after all.
(13) Used with "得" or "不" after the verb to indicate possible or impossible.
[②]［le˙］
(1) Auxiliary words. Show tense. Indicates the completion of an action or change (whether fact or fictitious, past or future).
(2) Auxiliary words. Show tense. Used between overlapping verbs to indicate the repetition of actions between brief periods.
(3) Particles. Express the tone. Indicates affirmation or certainty of a certain situation.
(4) Particles. Express the tone. Indicates an imperative.
[③] [liǎo]
Simplified word for "了1".
[④]［liào］
Simplified word for "了2".

[Subset Part 1] [Family Word Department] 　了; Kangxi Strokes: 2; Page Number: Page 85-11
[Tang Yun] Lu Niaoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yan Niaoqie [Zheng Yun] Lu Jiaoqie, let’s talk. [Zeng Yun] Jue also. [Guang Yun] Hui Ye, Xiao Jie Ye. [Later Han·Kong Rong Biography] Rong Nian is twelve intelligent. Wei said: It's too small, but big is not necessarily surprising. Also [Song Shu·Dai Faxing Biography] Pengcheng Wang Mi found Lingshi and got Faxing.　YeYeYeYeYe BiYe. [Book of Jin·Fu Yi Biography] The world's great weapon must be a little bit more, but when you look at everything you want, you are obsessed with official affairs, and official affairs are not easy. [Poems of Du Fu] How about Dai Zongfu. Qi Lu Qian is not there yet.　[Yangtze Dialect] again, soon. Qin said.　Qin Ji again, the name of the bird. [Notes from Qiu Chi] Like a parrot, with a crown of flesh in the brain, able to speak and laugh.

算~。②表示肯定语气:太好~。

了
lião / lē
V9了。

О ~ Да ~ но ~ ничего ~ Мин ~ Личное ~ В конце ~ Конец ~
Perfunctory ~ Все с первого взгляда ~ Ran: Straightforward ~ Не волнуйтесь ~ Разделить ~ На ~
lião / lē
V9.
le, liǎo, liào
I le
1) после глагола или прилагательного означает завершения действия или изменение состояния
写完了 написал
水位已经低了两米 уровень воды снизился на два метра
2) в конце предложения или паузы означает перемену, создание новой ситуации
下雨了 пошёл дождь, уже идёт дождь
我现在明白他的意思了 теперь я понимаю о чем он
II liǎo
1) заканчивать, завершать, улаживать, справляться
一了百了 разобравшись в одном — разобраться в остальном
这事儿已经了啦 это дело уже закончилось
这场纠纷还是他出头给了了 этот конфликт был улажен всё же благодаря его вмешательству
2) после глагола, вместе с 得 или 不 означает соответственно возможность или невозможность данного действия: несмочь, невозможно
来不了 не могу прийти
办得了 возможно сделать
3) понимать, получать ясное представление, ясный
明了 отчетливо понять
一目了然 понятный с одного взгляда
4) в полной мере, абсолютно; совершенно, полностью (с отрицанием)
了不相涉 не иметь никакого отношения
了无惧色 не проявлять и тени страха
5) умный, сообразительный
了干 умный и способный
6) светлый, блестящий
7) в конце концов, в итоге
了复何益？ в итоге какая польза?
III liào упрощ. 瞭
1) смотреть вдаль; смотреть издали
上高处了一了 посмотреть ввысь
2) смотреть, коситься
Radicals: 亅  (barb)
Meaning Mnemonic
Think about it this way. There is a famous fishing lure inventor, working on his best work ever. He’s old, and he’s been trying to make the best fishing lure for the last 50 years, and knows this will be his last invention. Then he figures it out. He takes one barb, and connects the end of it to the top of another barb. When he does this, he knows his work is finally finished.
Make sure you look at this amazing fishing lure too - hold it in your hand, see the two barbs fused together. Think about how strange this lure is. Is this really the best in the world? Will this really finish all other fishing lures?
Reading Mnemonic
How does the fish lure maker test his newly finished lure out? The one he just finished? He gets in a row (りょう) boat and rows out into the sea.
Make him think that he can’t just use his new lure on the side of the lake / ocean / whatever. He has to get out there, but unfortunately all he has is a crappy row boat. Imagine the row boat being terrible, leaky, and dangerous, which is why you’re surprised when he goes for it. That’s a terrible row boat to use! If you do this, you'll focus your mind on the rowboat part of things, which will help you to remember the reading of this kanji.
